---
title: "Academic Research"
---

My academic interests revolves around the development of more efficient sampling algorithms for problems with high-dimensional missing data. I have focused on stochastic epidemic models and breast cancer evolution models for which I have developed efficient block Metropolis-Hastings samplers to explore the latent space. Before my Ph.D., I developed a course recommender system for a Liberal Arts college and employed conformal prediction for grade prediction.
